iep_goals: Remain in seat during instruction for 10-minute intervals in 8 out of 10 opportunities
Complete independent work tasks without disruptive behavior in 7 out of 10 trials
accommodations: Clear behavior expectations with visual reminders
learning_styles: benefits from movement and sensory input
responds to clear expectations and consistent routines

interviews.parent: Parent reports Aiden is very active and creative but has trouble sitting still and focusing.
interviews.teacher: Aiden is enthusiastic about learning but needs frequent reminders about classroom expectations.

observations.psychologist: Average to above-average cognitive abilities with significant attention and impulse control challenges.
